definition: warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: Please put the thermometer under your armpit.
sentences.chinese: 请把体温表夹在你的腋下。

sentences.english: The nurse used a thermometer in order that she might take his temperature.
sentences.chinese: 护士使用体温表来量他的体温。

sentences.english: Please the thermometer in your mouth.
The doctor laid the boy along on the bed before he examined his body.
sentences.chinese: 医生在检查小男孩子身体温表前把他平放在一张床上。

sentences.english: Let me take your temperature. Would you put the thermometer under your arm. Please?
sentences.chinese: 我来给你量量体温，请把体温表放在腋下。

sentences.english: Of course they haven't the sense to keep a thermometer on board.
sentences.chinese: 当然他们没有航海时应该带上体温表的基本常识。

sentences.english: Would you put the thermometer under your arm, please?
sentences.chinese: 你把体温表放在腋下好吗？

sentences.english: She registered fever on the thermometer.
Please lend me a thermometer, because I feel fever.
sentences.chinese: 请借我一支体温表，我发烧了。

sentences.english: Let me take your temperature. Would you put the thermometer under your arm.
sentences.chinese: 我来给你量量体温，请把体温表放在腋下。

sentences.english: The nurse used a thermometer in order that she may take his temperature.
sentences.chinese: 护士使用体温表来量他的体温。

sentences.english: Put thIs thermometer under your tongue.
sentences.chinese: 把这体温表放在舌头底下。

sentences.english: Answer: I do not know if you had measured by thermometer.
sentences.chinese: 不知道你拿体温表量过没有。

sentences.english: Just put this thermometer under your armpit.
sentences.chinese: 把这个体温表放在腋下。

sentences.english: All right. How long shall I leave the thermometer in place?
sentences.chinese: 好的，体温表要放这里多长时间？

sentences.english: She put the thermometer in his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 她把体温表放入他口中。

definition: antipyretic (drug to reduce fever, such as sulfanilamide)
variant of 棉籤|棉签[mian2 qian1]/cotton swab
